3: IDENTIFY THE TYPE OF DEFECT IN THE [DEFECT AREA]
4: PICK THE SPECIFIC TOOL FOR THE [DEFECT AREA]
6: SNAP PICTURES OF [REPAIR AREA] DONE IF [INTERIOR], EXTERIOR [IF ABOVE HUMAN HEIGHT], IF NOT [SKIP]
7: SEND THE PICTURES OF [REPAIR AREA] TO THE HUMAN IF YES ABOVE
8: IF NO, ALERT THE HUMAN TO COME INSPECT THE REPAIR JOB
10: IF NOT PERFORM REPAIR ON [REPAIR AREA] AGAIN UNTIL AFFIRMATIVE
13: REPORT JOB DONE TO THE SITE CONTACT PERSONNEL
